articles.title: Pakistan Assures Help To US In Recovering Hostages From Afghanistan: Embassy - NDTV
articles.description: Pakistan has assured the US that it would continue to assist America and other countries in recovering their hostages from Afghanistan, but only as "a moral duty" and not under coercion or incentives.
articles.content:
US: Reports said pressuring Pakistan to act on hostage case has succeeded in the past (Representational).
Washington: Pakistan has assured the US that it would continue to assist America and other c… [+2044 chars]

articles.author: Amanda Holpuch
articles.title: US Covid deaths dip below 300 a day for first time since March 2020 - The Guardian
articles.description: Approaching milestone of 150 million Americans vaccinated but Biden falls short of target to send 80m doses abroad
articles.content: There was good news for Joe Biden on Monday, as US deaths from Covid-19 dipped below 300 a day for the first time since March last year. Data from federal sources also showed the drive to put shots i… [+3621 chars]

articles.author: The Washington Post
articles.title: Nintendo Switch is 'redefining what a console life cycle can look like' - IOL
articles.description: Doug Bowser, president of Nintendo of America, is a skilled communicator. And right now, his message is clear: The Switch is doing great, and new hardware will be announced when the time is right.
articles.content:
